owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._cumulativeFee: The cumulative fee credited to the account. Tracked by SGN.
params._powers: The signing powers of the signers.
params._sigs: The list of signatures sorted by signing addresses in ascending order. A withdrawal must be signed-off by +2/3 of the sigsVerifier's current signing power to be delivered.

calcFee(bytes).notice: Calculates the required fee for the message.

executeMessage(bytes,(address,address,ui.notice: Execute a message not associated with a transfer.

executeMessageWithTransfer(bytes,(uint8,.notice: Execute a message with a successful transfer.

executeMessageWithTransferRefund(bytes,(.notice: Execute a message with a refunded transfer.

sendMessage(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Sends a message to an app on another chain via MessageBus without an associated transfer. A fee is charged in the native gas token.

sendMessageWithTransfer(address,uint256,.notice: Sends a message associated with a transfer to an app on another chain via MessageBus without an associated transfer. A fee is charged in the native token.

withdrawFee(address,uint256,bytes[],addr.notice: Withdraws message fee in the form of native gas token.
